features.title: Technology
features.description: State-of-the-art 3D printing equipment delivering precision and quality for every project.

features.title: Service
features.description: Dedicated support for hobbyists and professionals throughout the Tokyo region.

features.title: Accessible
features.description: Competitive pricing that makes 3D printing accessible for projects of all sizes.

faqs.question: What printing technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We primarily use FDM and resin printing technologies to accommodate various project needs.

faqs.question: What is the typical turnaround time?
faqs.answer: Small projects typically take 3-5 business days. Larger or complex projects may require additional time.

faqs.question: What file formats do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept STL, OBJ, and 3MF file formats. If you have other formats, please contact us.

faqs.question: Do you offer design services?
faqs.answer: We focus on printing services, but we can recommend trusted designers in the Tokyo area.

terms.title: Service Agreement
terms.content: By using our 3D printing services, you agree to provide files that do not infringe on copyright or intellectual property rights. All designs and files remain the property of the customer.

terms.title: Payment Terms
terms.content: Payment is required before production begins. We accept various payment methods and will provide a detailed quote before starting any project.

terms.title: Quality Guarantee
terms.content: We strive for excellence in every print. If there are any issues with print quality due to our error, we will reprint the item at no additional cost.

terms.title: Turnaround Time
terms.content: Estimated turnaround times are provided as guidelines. Actual completion times may vary based on project complexity and current workload.
